name: Wildman
description: The only survivor of secret genetic experiments carried out in a remote part of Scotland, Wildman has followed the call of the wild blood in his veins and made his way to Pulp City. He suspects that there he might find the man responsible for arranging the experiments that transformed him into a man-beast, and when he does, Wildman will exact painful vengeance.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: Androida
description: The first non-human to become a university professor, Androida still finds time to teach while being one of the world's most prominent Supremes. When not on campus or Hero duty, she runs several women's shelters and still finds time to play the role of Heavy Metal's PR face. With the reconstruction after the Fall, Androida has become fast friends with the feisty Rosie Rude, helping Rosie to adjust to her own new-found role as Supreme.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: Arquero
description: Regular partner to the mysterious Riposte, Arquero hunts the night armed with his tech bow and deadly arrows. Arquero's mission as a vigilante began as he sought to avenge the murder of his parents. Since that time Riposte has guided and trained him. He has yet to confront the killers of his parents, but that day will come.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: C.O.R.E. Charlemagne
description: As Earth's first and only Artificial Intelligence, C.O.R.E. has been mankind's greatest achievement. Able to monitor every computer in the world, C.O.R.E. always knows where and when danger will appear. He is able to construct a physical body out of nearby metallic components so is able to respond instantly to any crisis. His tactical mastery allows him to adapt a power set and physical form that will be most useful in any situation.

Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

description: As Earth's first and only Artificial Intelligence, C.O.R.E. has been mankind's greatest achievement. description: As Earth's first and only Artificial Intelligence, C.O.R.E. has been mankind's greatest achievement. links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: Twilight
powers_skills: Assassination, infiltration, spirit walking, martial arts and gun expertise.
description: Confilcted as the Coven's prime assassin, Twilight is a martial arts expert (sent to study in Asia), gun expert and covert ops specialist. As with most of its non-supernatural members, Twilight is an orphan, indoctrinated and brainwashed at early age. What is not obvious is that Twilight utilizes minor voodoo charms that allow her to hide and travel in the spirit world. Chips and cracks have started showing in her loyalty, mostly due to the exposure to the darker supernatural practices of the Coven.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: Guerilla
powers_skills: Firearms and martial expertise, super strength.
description: The first Awakened ape and to date, the most powerful and respected leader of the team, relying purely on hus primal instincts. Guerilla is no stranger to modern day weaponry and will go to any lengths to provide for his fellow primates.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: Francis Gator
powers_skills: Feral senses, minor voodoo mastery, ground waters control, minor fauna control.
description: Born of dark magick and into dark magick, an unholy union of the Albino Gator and a human witch, Fracis is the most bloodthirsty member of the Coven. He holds humans in the utmost contempt. Devoid of empathy, he is unable to form any social bonds, which makes him the ultimate weapon. With no remorse, thick-headedness, and high pain tolerance, all are like a secondary set of teeth, ready to tear into the Coven's enemies. His innate powers are bound to water's murky depths.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: Rook
powers_skills: Close combat, personal protection, damage resistance.
description: A former tester for the Coven Enterprises Military Division, now bearer of state-of-the-art armory and weaponry - including the powerful Tremor Halberd and Impact Armor. Lacking supernatural powers, Rook has some military background. He is the Coven's weak spot and the source of most of their leaks. His secretly tightening of relations with Heavy Metal Supremes may lead to the Coven's division.

links.description: Background story
Buy / View card on Pulp City Store

name: John Grimmsham
powers_skills: Grimm command, sabotage and diversion, toxicology and chemistry expertise.
description: A wannabe screenwriter that worked as a security guard for most of his life, John fled underground after killing a movie producer. He found a place for himself amongst the Gromm and was quicly recognized as their leader, mostly for the vesatility of his skills : starting fire, using technology and chemistry among others.
